attributes.action: Knight Chris Rees for services to disliking liverpool fans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Chris Rees has long been peddling the same old schtick for many a year and now it is your chance to honour him with a pre posthumous knighthood.

Steve Gerrard are you listening
John Oshea wasnt missing
The title come may, we'll have in our hands
Walking in an Anfield wonderland

Other than that please put a £10 note in an envelope and send it to Tony, 10 downing st, london. hopefully if enough of you send one he'll just give me one anyway.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
